Title: Relates to pro bono service by attorneys and candidates for admission to the bar
Summary: Authorizes a requirement of pro bono service as a condition of admission to the bar or attorney registration; exempts pro bono work performed pursuant to an agreement with the federal government if the federal government designates the recipients of the pro bono work or type or types or nature of such legal services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to pro bono service by attorneys and candidates for admission to the bar
